document.full_text: former world number one maria sharapova started her french open campaign in convincing fashion by dismissing croatian mirjana lucic 6-3 6-0 to advance into the second round on tuesday.
document.title: maria sharapova strolls into round two in paris
lines_and_colors: former world number one maria sharapova started her french open campaign in convincing fashion by dismissing croatian mirjana lucic 6-3 6-0 to advance into the second round on tuesday.
